basic.Peptide Name: Antimicrobial peptide 1 (Mc-AMP1; knottin-type peptide; Plant defensin)
basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus megaterium (IC50=2 µg/mL), Sarcina lutea (IC50=50 µg/mL).Fungi:Alternaria brassicola (IC50=6 µg/mL), Ascochyta pisi (IC50=6 µg/mL), Botrytis cinerea (IC50=2 µg/mL), Cercospora beticola (IC50=2 µg/mL), Colletotrichum lindemuthianum (IC50=1 µg/mL), Fusarium culmorum (IC50=3 µg/mL), Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. Pisi (IC50=5 µg/mL), Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. Lycopersici (IC50=10 µg/mL), Nectria haematococca (IC50=0.5 µg/mL), Phoma betae (IC50=6 µg/mL), Pyrenophora tritici-repentis (IC50=20 µg/mL), Pyricularia oryzae (IC50=0.5 µg/mL), Rhizoctonia solani (IC50=15 µg/mL), Verticiliium dahliae (IC50=0.5 µg/mL), Venturia inaequalis (IC50=1 µg/mL).
